original_text: But instead, you talk about what you have decided to do. You speak as if you have the power to make it happen. It is wrong to speak like that.
korean_text: 이제도 너희가 허탄한 자랑을 하니 그러한 자랑은 다 악한 것이라

sentences.original_text: But instead, you talk about what you have decided to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 당신은 하기로 결정한 것들에 대해 이야기합니다.

sentences.original_text: You speak as if you have the power to make it happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그것을 이루게 할 힘이 있는 것처럼 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: It is wrong to speak like that.
